The file 'feedback.xlsx' contains a list of customers who provided feedback on a product. The data includes their names, email addresses, ratings (out of 5), and comments.

Here's a summary of the feedback:

- John Doe: 3/5 - Amazing product but needs improvement in customer service.
- Jane Doe: 5/5 - Great service, very responsive team.
- Emily Clark: 5/5 - Exceptionally satisfied with the service.
- Lucas Brown: 2/5 - Needs improvement in customer support.
- Olivia Smith: 4/5 - Very happy with the product quality.
- Ethan Jones: 1/5 - Disappointed with the delivery time.
- Ava Taylor: 3/5 - Average experience.
- Liam Wilson: 5/5 - Outstanding service, highly recommend.
- Mia Anderson: 2/5 - Expected more based on reviews.
- Noah Lee: 4/5 - (Unclear or unrelated comment).
- Isabella Martin: 1/5 - Unsatisfactory product condition.
- Mason Thompson: 3/5 - Decent product but room for improvement.

The overall sentiment is mixed, with several customers expressing satisfaction (Jane Doe, Emily Clark, Liam Wilson) and others dissatisfaction (Ethan Jones, Mia Anderson, Isabella Martin). Some common themes include the need for improved customer service and support.
